        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of a field in the input event schema that's to be used as the source of a mapping.{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
